links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power

wikitext.*:
'''Robert Bryan Cogman''' ([[25 July|July 25]], [[1979]]) is an American television writer and producer.He is mostly known for his work as writer and producer in television series ''[[Wikipedia:Game of Thrones|Game of Thrones]]'', based on 
[[George R. R. Martin]]'s books. He was a consulting producer and co-writer of the first season only of the ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power‎]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=Denise Petski |articleurl=https://deadline.com/2019/05/game-of-thrones-bryan-cogman-lord-of-the-rings-amazon-series-1202620726/|articlename=‘Game Of Thrones’ Alum Bryan Cogman Joins ‘Lord Of The Rings’ Amazon Series
|dated=22 May 2019|website=Deadline|accessed=14 March 2021}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=Lesley Goldberg |articleurl=https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/live-feed/lord-of-the-rings-adds-20-to-sprawling-cast-for-amazon-series|articlename=
'Lord of the Rings' Adds 20 to Sprawling Cast for Amazon Series
|dated=03 December 2020|website=Deadline|accessed=14 March 2021}}</ref>
